verses.verse: That which<WG3739> was from the beginning,<WG746> which<WG3739> we have heard,<WG191> which<WG3739> we have seen<WG3708> with our eyes,<WG3788> which<WG3739> we have looked<WG2300> on, and our hands<WG5495> have handled,<WG5584> of the Word<WG3056> of life;<WG2222>

(For the life<WG2222> was manifested,<WG5319> and we have seen<WG3708> it, and bear<WG3140> witness,<WG3140> and show<WG518> to you that eternal<WG166> life,<WG2222> which<WG3748> was with the Father,<WG3962> and was manifested<WG5319> to us;)

That which<WG3739> we have seen<WG3708> and heard<WG191> declare<WG518> we to you, that you also<WG2532> may have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with us: and truly<WG1161> our fellowship<WG2842> is with the Father,<WG3962> and with his Son<WG5207> Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
And these<WG5023> things write<WG1125> we to you, that your<WG5216> joy<WG5479> may be full.<WG4137>

This<WG3778> then<WG2532> is the message<WG1860> which<WG3739> we have heard<WG191> of him, and declare<WG312> to you, that God<WG2316> is light,<WG5457> and in him is no<WG3756> darkness<WG4653> at<WG3762> all.<WG3762>
If<WG1437> we say<WG2036> that we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> with him, and walk<WG4043> in darkness,<WG4655> we lie,<WG5574> and do<WG4160> not the truth:<WG225>

But if<WG1437> we walk<WG4043> in the light,<WG5457> as he is in the light,<WG5457> we have<WG2192> fellowship<WG2842> one<WG3391> with another,<WG240> and the blood<WG129> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> his Son<WG5207> cleans<WG2511> us from all<WG3956> sin.<WG266>
If<WG1437> we say<WG2036> that we have<WG2192> no<WG3756> sin,<WG266> we deceive<WG4105> ourselves,<WG1438> and the truth<WG225> is not in us.
If<WG1437> we confess<WG3670> our sins,<WG266> he is faithful<WG4103> and just<WG1342> to forgive<WG863> us our sins,<WG266> and to cleanse<WG2511> us from all<WG3956> unrighteousness.<WG93>
If<WG1437> we say<WG2036> that we have not sinned,<WG264> we make<WG4160> him a liar,<WG5583> and his word<WG3056> is not in us.
